name: Ceaseless (RTficial)
description:
You awaken in an unknown town, you don't remember how you got here and it seems to be entirely devoid of life.  Then you see it, whatever it is, floating towards you.  Its presence causes immense pain and you begin to lose yourself, piece by piece falling into the void.   Each time you lose yourself entirely, you awaken once more to be chased relentlessly, toyed with by the mysterious entity.  All you can hope to achieve is to maintain enough energy to keep moving, eating the ever shifting supply of pineapples (?!?!) to fuel yourself in the hopes of an escape.

  • arrow keys - move
  • x - pick up/use
  • z - drop

I am aware there is a strange bug with the pineapples, who knew they were going to be a bigger threat than 'the dread'?!  I am going to work toward fixing this bug but I found that sometimes you might need to press x multiple times to make it work and even then it is uncertain.  I am really sorry for the inconvenience this causes, I know its frustrating.

There are also several other features I had planned for this included gated areas, different ways to find and even grow food, a need to cook the food before you can eat it (an added level of stress when being endlessly persued) and possibly some little secrets.  These will be worked on after the jam but I got as much as I could done within the time and hope it still proves an enjoyable game or at least shows some promise so you come back to this when the issues have been ironed out!  Have fun!
